biotools.summary: The new version of the SKEMPI database, with more than 7000 mutation data. The SKEMPI2 database contains data on the changes in thermodynamic parameters and kinetic rate constants upon mutation, for protein-protein interactions for which a structure of the complex has been solved and is available in the protein databank.

bioschemas.name: SKEMPI
